translation.en: -You're late again, Charlie. -Sorry, Dwight. It was my alarm.

translation.en: Last time. I mean it. Katie!

translation.en: [Dwight] If you want to be the busboy, you have to be on time. Your hear me?
translation.zh: 你想来这里打杂就得准时上班 听见了吗？

translation.en: Here you go.
Hey?
Sleeping Beauty.
Sorry.
It's all right.
Rough day?
Yeah.
What are you studying?
Nothing. Just contemporary sociological theory and empirical corporate analysis.
translation.zh: 没什么 只是当代社会学理论及实证企业分析

translation.en: Sounds like fun.
You know, when it comes to corporate empirical analysis,
the jokes just kinda write themselves.
translation.zh: 这个词本身就是个笑话

translation.en: That's what you'd think.
Can I get you anything else?
[Katie] Adam.
Honey.
-No. -My break's over.
-No. -Yes.
-No. -Come on.
-No! -Dwight's gonna come looking for me.
-You gotta stop working nights. -I know.
It's all they've got.
We just have to keep our heads above water until you finish school.
translation.zh: 在你毕业以前 我们将就一下吧

translation.en: It's not exactly what I had in mind when we got married.
translation.zh: 我们结婚时 我可不是这么想的

translation.en: We made it this far. Right?
translation.zh: 我们都走到这么远了 不是吗？

translation.en: We just have to see it through.
translation.zh: 我们只要往前看就对了

translation.en: Once you graduate school, find a great job,
translation.zh: 等你毕业找到一份高薪工作后

translation.en: I'll go back to grad school.
And I can support you in a manner in which you deserve.
translation.zh: 然后我就能以你应得的方式养你

translation.en: You'd better.
How did I get so lucky?
I love you.
I love you too.
[Katie] Okay, let's go. Dwight's gonna pitch a fit.
translation.zh: 好了 走吧 德怀特要发作了

translation.en: -All right. -Out the door.
I'm going.
Come on, you.
-[man] Where's the rest of it? -[Dwight] There is no more money.
-You have all the money. -Give me the goddamned money!
translation.zh: -所有的钱都在你手上-把钱都给我！

translation.en: -[woman screams] -[man] Shut the hell up!
[man] Shut up or you're dead people!
translation.zh: 闭嘴 不然就毙了你们！

translation.en: -Don't mess with me! -I got nothing else!
I'm gonna put a cap in your ass old man! Do not mess with me!
translation.zh: 老家伙 小心我往你的屁股开枪！别惹恼我！

translation.en: -Don't shoot somebody else. -Yeah, well she's next!
translation.zh: -不要朝其他人开枪！-下一个就是她！

translation.en: -[Dwight] Please, we don't need trouble. -[man] Want me to do it?
[man] I'll do it right now! I'll do you all. Right now!
translation.zh: 我马上开枪 我要朝你们开枪！ 马上！

translation.en: -[Dwight] Nobody else gotta get hurt. -[man] Then give me the money man!
translation.zh: -不要伤害任何人-那就把钱给我啊！

translation.en: You don't have to hurt anybody else. Take the money.
translation.zh: 不要伤害任何人 把钱拿走就对了

translation.en: -[man] Hey, I told you. Shut up! -[Dwight] There is no more money!
translation.zh: -我叫你闭嘴！-这里已经没钱了！

translation.en: [man] Shut up!
[man] I'm done with you, you hear me?
translation.zh: 我受够了 听见了吗？

translation.en: -[man] I'm done with both of you! -[Dwight] I'm begging you!
-[man] Better pray old man! -[woman] Give him all the money!
translation.zh: -你祈祷吧 老家伙！-把钱都给他吧！

translation.en: I'll do it right now! You hear me? Do not mess with me old man!
translation.zh: 我马上就开枪 听见了吗？别惹恼我 老家伙！

translation.en: [reporter] A customer is being called a hero  after preventing a robbery at the Smile Diner
translation.zh: 周六晚间位于芝加哥南部的微笑餐厅遭遇抢劫

translation.en: in South Chicago on Saturday night. While the good Samaritan is uninjured,
translation.zh: 所幸被一名食客出手阻止后者蒙受轻伤 如今被誉为英雄

translation.en: busboy Charles Sturley was shot and died at the scene.
translation.zh: 另外餐厅打杂工人查尔斯史特勒则当场中枪身亡

translation.en: Raymond Gaskin has been charged and is now in custody at Chicago Memorial, recovering from wounds sustained in the fight.
translation.zh: 劫匪雷蒙盖斯金已遭提控目前被关押在芝加哥纪念医院养伤

translation.en: Smile Diner remains closed at this time.
translation.zh: 截至目前为止 微笑餐厅仍在休业中

translation.en: In other news, the culprits of the diamond heist that occurred...
translation.zh: 换个新闻焦点 钻石抢劫案主脑…

translation.en: Morning, Leonard.
[answer machine] No new message.
Thank you, Katie.
My father planted that tree on the day I was born,
translation.zh: 我父亲在我出生那天种下那棵树

translation.en: eighty-eight years ago.
[Katie] It's beautiful.
When I was a boy,
people would say my mother had a green thumb.
translation.zh: 人们常说我母亲是个园艺好手

translation.en: Our garden was quite the show place.
translation.zh: 我们的花园就像个展览馆

translation.en: Look at it now.
I hired a fellow once to clean it up.
translation.zh: 我曾雇用一名园丁来打理

translation.en: This was a couple of years ago.
Nice young man.
Ethan something, I think.
What happened to him?
I don't know.
He worked for a few weeks and then stopped coming.
translation.zh: 他上班几个星期后就不来了

translation.en: Never saw him again.
Listen to me!
-I sound like some silly old man. -No!
translation.zh: -我知道我说话像个傻老人-不会！

translation.en: And today is our anniversary.
-What? -Yes. Four months ago today,
translation.zh: -什么？-对啊 四个月前的今天

translation.en: the agency sent you to my door,
translation.zh: 照护服务机构把你送到我家门前

translation.en: my new caretaker, companion, and friend.
translation.zh: 成为我的新看护、陪伴和朋友

translation.en: And friend.
Come on.
It's time to take your medication.
They're gonna schedule the last round of interviews in a couple weeks.
translation.zh: 几个星期后他们会再安排最后一轮面试

translation.en: Couple of weeks?
It's a big company. Gotta jump through a lot of hoops.
translation.zh: 那是一家大公司 有很多门槛

translation.en: But... that kind of job, you know, they have their own way of doing things.
translation.zh: 这种工作 公司有自己的一套做法

translation.en: -I can't really push them. -No, I know, I'm just--
translation.zh: -我总不能催他们-我知道 只是…

translation.en: I'm a little stressed right now.
You got another call from the student loan people today.
translation.zh: 就学贷款的人今天又打来找你了

translation.en: God, they never quit.
Well, you stopped taking classes so we have to start paying off the loans.
translation.zh: 竟然你已经停课了就要开始交纳学费

translation.en: Otherwise, they'll turn it over to a collection agency.
translation.zh: 不然他们就会交给追收债务机构处理

translation.en: -I know, yeah, I'm gonna call tomorrow. -Great. And maybe you can call
translation.zh: -知道了 我明天会联络他们-很好 也许你可以…

translation.en: the credit card people while you're at it too.
translation.zh: 顺便联络一下信用卡的负责人

translation.en: And the rep with our health insurance.
Okay, Katie, I get it. I'll figure something out, all right?
translation.zh: 好了 凯蒂 我明白了我会想办法的 好吗？

translation.en: Don't worry.
I'm gonna get started on the dishes.
-Katie. -Don't tell me not to worry.
I'm sorry.
We're in serious trouble, Adam.
translation.zh: 亚当 我们麻烦大了

translation.en: -We need to get some money coming in soon. -I'll find something.
translation.zh: -我们马上就要用钱了-我会想办法的

translation.en: You've been saying that for months.
translation.zh: 这句话你已经说好几个月了

translation.en: It doesn't do us any good for me to take some minimum wage job.
translation.zh: 就算我现在去找份底薪差事也于事无补啊

translation.en: That's why I quit school, so that I can find something that pays enough.
translation.zh: 我停学就是为了找一份高薪差事

translation.en: We can start chipping away at our debt. I just need a little bit more time.
translation.zh: 到时就可以慢慢缴清债务我只是需要多点时间

translation.en: We don't have any more time, Adam.
translation.zh: 亚当 我们已经没有时间了

translation.en: -Here, let me help you. -No, it's fine. I've got it.
translation.zh: -我来帮你-不用了 我应付得来

translation.en: I've got it, Adam. Adam!
I'll clean it up.
Why don't you ever listen to me?
translation.zh: 为什么你从来不听我的话？

translation.en: Why did you go in there?
I begged you, Adam.
translation.zh: 亚当 我求你不要进去了

translation.en: He could have killed you.
I could have lost you. Can you imagine how that would have felt?
translation.zh: 我差点就失去你了你想象得到那是什么感受吗？

translation.en: Never...
holding you again, never hearing your voice.
translation.zh: 无法拥抱你 再也听不到你声音

translation.en: Nothing's right anymore.
Babe, it's been four months.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 事情已经过去四个月了

translation.en: No.
No, I'm sorry. It's-- No.
translation.zh: 不要 对不起 我不想要

translation.en: Where are you going?
Out.
Who's there?
[Katie] Leonard.
Oh, it's you.
Katie.
-What are you doing out here? -I thought you were asleep.
translation.zh: -你在外面做什么？-我以为你睡着了

translation.en: I just... came here to think.
What are you doing with that?
I thought I heard someone in the house again.
translation.zh: 我以为又有人闯进屋里

translation.en: -Again? -I hear them walking
and when I come down, they're always gone.
translation.zh: 等我下楼后 脚步声就消失了

translation.en: There's no one in the house.
Here.
Are you all right?
Why didn't you tell me you had troubles with money?
translation.zh: 你怎么不早告诉我你有经济问题？

translation.en: Oh, it's... not your problem.
-How much do you need? -Leonard, no.
translation.zh: -你需要多少钱？-莱纳德 不必了

translation.en: We're friends, aren't we?
translation.zh: 我们是朋友 不是吗？

translation.en: We are.
Well, then let me help you.
-I've got a little money set aside. -I could never do that.
translation.zh: -我有一笔闲钱-我不能受你恩惠

translation.en: A young couple starting out.
translation.zh: 一对刚出来闯荡的年轻夫妇

translation.en: The world is complicated enough. You shouldn't have to worry about money.
translation.zh: 这个世界已经够复杂了你们不应该为钱而烦恼

translation.en: It comes with the territory.
But to be in love,
maybe have a family one day, grow old together.
translation.zh: 有朝一日一起组织家庭 一起变老

translation.en: These are wonderful things.
Things I wanted when I was a young man.
translation.zh: 也是我年轻时想要经历的事

translation.en: And it would be nice to think, that in some small way,
translation.zh: 想到我能尽一分力 心情就好起来

translation.en: I made a difference to someone.
translation.zh: 毕竟我改变了某人的人生

translation.en: Maybe to you and your young man.
translation.zh: 也许我也可以改变你和你男人的人生

translation.en: He needs a job.
I'll tell Leonard you're here.
translation.zh: 我去跟莱纳德说你到了

translation.en: It'll be fine.
Just talk to him.
Okay.
Lorazepam, point five milligrams.
Yes.
I can pick it up after five probably...

translation.en: [Leonard] Local tycoons who built it...

translation.en: Thank you. Bye.
... so they could get their family away from the smell of the stock yards.
translation.zh: 主要是为了让家人远离牲畜场发出的臭味

translation.en: But their children grew up and...
translation.zh: 但他们的孩子都长大了 所以…

translation.en: -Hi, how are you doing? -Hi.
So sorry to bother you. My name is Mickey Hayden.
translation.zh: 抱歉 打扰了 我叫米基海登

translation.en: Real estate agent.
Believe me, I know how this is gonna sound, okay,
translation.zh: 相信我 我知道自己在说什么

translation.en: but I have this new client, just got transferred to the city for work.
translation.zh: 我有个客户 刚搬来这座城市工作

translation.en: He's got a big family, couple of dogs, the whole nine yards.
translation.zh: 他拥有一个大家庭、几只狗总之应有尽有

translation.en: It's adorable. Anyway, he's looking for just the right home.
translation.zh: 是一户友好的人家无论如何 他在找一个合适的家园

translation.en: And yesterday, he was driving through the neighborhood here,
translation.zh: 昨天他开车经过这个小区

translation.en: took one look at this amazing house--
translation.zh: 看了一眼这间漂亮的房子

translation.en: Oh, this house isn't for sale.
Are you the owner?
No, but, trust me, you'd be wasting your time.
translation.zh: 不是 但相信我 你这是在浪费时间

translation.en: He's lived here his entire life.
He's not going anywhere.
My client is seriously motivated.
translation.zh: 我的客户真的很感兴趣

translation.en: Yeah, I don't know what to tell you.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么跟你说

translation.en: I'm sorry.
But good luck.
Oh, wait. Look...
could you do me a favor, Ms...
translation.zh: 可以帮我一个忙吗？这位…

translation.en: Katie.
Katie.
If by some crazy chance he happens to change his mind,
translation.zh: 不过如果屋主突然想不开

translation.en: could you have him call me?
That's not gonna happen, but sure.
translation.zh: 那是不可能的事 不过没问题

translation.en: I appreciate that, thank you.
Yeah.
You have a great day.
You too.
- [Adam] They want to make an offer? - [Katie] Sounds like it.
translation.zh: -他们想要买下那间房子？-我想是吧

translation.en: They don't even care what the yard looks like?
translation.zh: 完全不在乎院子杂草丛生吗？

translation.en: I'm sure it'll look better after you start work on it tomorrow.
translation.zh: 等你开工后我相信院子就会整齐些了

translation.en: Place must be worth a fortune.
translation.zh: 那间房子肯定价格不菲

translation.en: Must be nice.
Leonard?
There you are. I've got your breakfast.
translation.zh: 原来你在这里 我给你做了早餐

translation.en: -Thank you, Katie. -Of course.
My parents used to play this.
translation.zh: 我父母经常放这首曲子

translation.en: It's lovely.
Sit with me a moment.
Sure.
Did you lock the back door?
-Yep. -Good.
So, when do I get the grand tour and see how the other half lives?
translation.zh: 我什么时候有机会去参观这间房子看看有钱人的生活环境？

translation.en: [Katie] The time will come.
[Adam] What about that Buick? Looks like it's been parked there for a while.
translation.zh: 那辆别克轿车是怎么回事？好像停在那边好一段时日了

translation.en: -Does Leonard even drive it anymore? -No, not since I've known him.
translation.zh: -莱纳德还开着那辆车吗？-从我们认识以来 他不曾碰过那辆车

translation.en: I don't think he's driven it in years.
translation.zh: 我相信他好多年没开过那辆车了

translation.en: I was reading online about this medical school with a really great program in pediatric surgery.
translation.zh: 我在网上发现一家医学院提供一个不错的小儿外科课程

translation.en: I could send you the link.
I love you.
I love you too.
-Mr. Calvern. -Hello Katie, how are you today?
translation.zh: -凯文先生-嗨 凯蒂 今天过得好吗？

translation.en: I'm fine, thank you. We weren't expecting you.
translation.zh: 我很好 谢谢 没料到你会来

translation.en: Oh, is-- Is this a good time?
Sure, yeah. Come in.
Leonard, Mr. Calvern is here from the agency.
translation.zh: 莱纳德照护服务机构的凯文先生来了

translation.en: Good morning, Mr. Wellsley.
translation.zh: 早上好 韦斯利先生

translation.en: Mr. Calvern, how nice to see you again. Come to check up on us?
translation.zh: 凯文先生 很高兴再次见到你来查看我们吗？

translation.en: Not at all. I happened to be in the neighborhood
translation.zh: 不是 完全没有那个意思我刚好就在附近

translation.en: and I thought I'd drop in, say hello.
I thought we might have a chat.
Yeah. I'll get lunch started. Just call me if you need anything.
translation.zh: 好啊 我去准备午餐需要什么尽管告诉我

translation.en: -Thank you, Katie. -Yeah.
-Come back here. -Oh, great.
This is my favorite room.
-What's for lunch? -Adam!
-You're all jumpy in the big scary house? -You can't be in here.
translation.zh: -你在这间可怕的大宅被吓着了？-你不能出现在这里

translation.en: There's a guy from the agency, and he's doing a drop-in.
translation.zh: 那是照护服务机构的人他来探访我们

translation.en: Oh. Well, you're doing a great job.
translation.zh: 你把客户照顾得很好啊

translation.en: Yeah, and he sees my husband working here. That won't look a little funny?
translation.zh: 要是被他发现我老公在这里工作难道不会觉得不妥吗？

translation.en: Oh, you mean like maybe we're just... messing around?
translation.zh: 你是说要是被他发现我们胡搞吗？

translation.en: I don't know-- Stop it.
-Come on. -Okay.
But I'm hungry.
-[Mr. Calvern] So, how is everything? -[Adam] Love you.
[Leonard] Well... that's a question that people ask all the time to people of my age.
translation.zh: 是啊 像我这把年纪的人经常被问这个问题

translation.en: [Mr. Calvern] Well, Mr. Wellsley seems in good spirits.  You two have gotten very close.
translation.zh: 韦斯利先生看起来精神不错你们俩相处得很好

translation.en: Yeah, he's an interesting man. I like talking to him.
translation.zh: 他是个有趣的人 我也喜欢跟他聊天

translation.en: You hired a gardener?
Part-time, yeah. It was Leonard's idea.
translation.zh: 他只是临时工 那是莱纳德的想法

translation.en: Okay. Well, I'll see you soon, Katie.
translation.zh: 好吧 那择日再见 凯蒂

translation.en: Yeah.
I can't say I especially care for our Mr. Calvern.
translation.zh: 我对这位凯文先生没什么好感

translation.en: -Why not? -He keeps asking all these questions,
like he's trying to trip me up to make you look bad.
translation.zh: 像是刻意想要误导我说你是个不称职的看护

translation.en: He's just making sure I'm taking good care of you. That's all.
translation.zh: 他只是想确认我有没有把你顾好没有其他目的

translation.en: Well, don't you worry. I told him I couldn't get along without you.
translation.zh: 放心吧 我跟他说 没有你我撑不下去

translation.en: Speaking of which...
Thank you.
Adam?
Look.
Look.
Whoa.
Did you get a raise?
Oh, no.
What?
I said something to Leonard...
about us.
What do you mean?
I told him we're broke.
Christ, Katie.
-It's a little personal, don't you think? -I was upset.
translation.zh: -你不觉得那是私事吗？-我当时感到很难过

translation.en: You were being a jerk, and I needed to talk to somebody.
translation.zh: 那时你对我不好 我想找个人聊心事

translation.en: -When was I being a jerk? -That's not the point.
translation.zh: -我什么时候对你不好了？-那不是重点

translation.en: Leonard wanted to help, so he offered to give us money.
translation.zh: 莱纳德想帮助我们于是他说要为我们提供金援

translation.en: And you said yes?
No, I asked him to give you a job instead.
translation.zh: 没有 我叫他给你找一份差事

translation.en: Well, maybe this check is for both of us. Like he added an extra zero.
translation.zh: 也许这笔钱是我们俩的薪资所以他多加了一个零

translation.en: It's too much.
What are you doing?
I'm calling him. We can't keep this. He has to write us another check.
translation.zh: 打给他 说我们不能接受叫他再给我们开一张支票

translation.en: By the time we drive back to the house and he writes another check,
translation.zh: 待我们开车回到他的家让他再开一张支票后

translation.en: the bank will be closed.
If we don't pay these bills by today, Katie, they'll be kicking in our door.
translation.zh: 凯蒂 我们今天再不缴清账单明天就会被扫地出门了

translation.en: He's not answering.
All right, look,
why don't we... deposit the check--
translation.zh: 要不我们干脆把支票汇入…

translation.en: -We cannot take this money. -It's just for tonight.
translation.zh: -这笔钱不能收-只要熬过今晚就行了

translation.en: Pay the bills. Talk to Leonard in the morning.
translation.zh: 缴清账单 明天再跟莱纳德说清楚

translation.en: You can write him a check for the difference.
translation.zh: 然后你再开一张支票把尾数还给他

translation.en: It's one night, Katie.
[Adam] What's Leonard's deal, anyway?
translation.zh: 莱纳德到底做什么生意？

translation.en: What's he doing in that big house all by himself?
translation.zh: 他一个人待在屋里做什么？

translation.en: His parents passed away like... thirty years ago.
translation.zh: 他父母早在30年前就过世了

translation.en: He's an only child. Never married.
translation.zh: 他是独生子 终生未娶

translation.en: No other family?
No.
It must be tough...
just being all alone like that.
[Katie] Yeah.
He's such a good guy.
[Adam] Yeah.
-Love you. -I love you too.
Leonard?
Leonard?
Leonard?
I'm sorry.
What was he doing up here in the attic?
He liked to come up here sometimes.
translation.zh: 他有时候喜欢待在阁楼里

translation.en: Listen to old records.
What would he need to keep locked up here?
Adam.
We shouldn't.
I'm just gonna look.
Katie.
Come look.
Who's she?
I don't know.
All these letters.
Didn't you say that Leonard never married?
translation.zh: 你不是说莱纳德终生未娶吗？

translation.en: We shouldn't do this.
All right.
Let's go.
We need to call 911.
Holy!
[Katie] What?
That's a lot of money.
[Adam] You said he lived alone here for how many years?
translation.zh: 你说他独自住在这里多少年了？

translation.en: [Adam] People get a little eccentric.
translation.zh: 这种人会变得越来越古怪

translation.en: Start by putting some aside, little by little,
translation.zh: 开始存钱 聚少成多

translation.en: and before you know it...
He doesn't have any family.
It'll end up in a police locker somewhere.
translation.zh: 这笔钱最终会落在警察的储物柜里

translation.en: Government'll take it.
Why should we let it get caught up in the system like that?
translation.zh: 为什么要让这笔钱落入这么腐败的体系？

translation.en: When it could actually do some real good.
translation.zh: 它本来可以用来做好事的

translation.en: I mean, you said yourself how much he cared about you. He wanted to help.
translation.zh: 你自己也说过他非常在乎你他想要帮助你

translation.en: He did.
Well, there you have it.
A way for him to help you.
Help us.
We would have to be careful.
translation.zh: 我们必须谨慎处理才行

translation.en: Yeah. We will.
Adam.
-Yeah. -Promise me.
I promise.
[detective] So how long did you work for Mr. Wellsley?
translation.zh: 你服务韦斯利先生多久了？

translation.en: About four and a half months.
And you lived here too?
Leonard stayed here alone at night. That's how he wanted it.
translation.zh: 晚上莱纳德自己在屋里待着这是他的想法

translation.en: He could still get around okay.
When was the last time you saw him? Yesterday afternoon.
translation.zh: -你们最后一次见面是什么时候？-昨天下午

translation.en: We left a little early to go to the bank around...
translation.zh: 因为要赶去银行 我们提早离开那个时候大概是…

translation.en: Around 4:30.
And you worked here too, Mr. Kettner?
translation.zh: 凯特纳先生 你也在这里上班吗？

translation.en: Just a couple weeks. I was doing some yard work for Leonard.
translation.zh: 只工作了几个星期我为莱纳德清理院子

translation.en: We're married.
I kind of got that.
Yeah.
So how was Mr. Wellsley doing? Was he having any health issues recently?
translation.zh: 韦斯利先生生前过得如何？最近有没有什么健康状况？

translation.en: No. He's been fine. I mean...
translation.zh: 没有 他向来好好的 我是说…

translation.en: he's 88, so he took a lot of medication but...
translation.zh: 他已经88岁了 服用很多药 可是…

translation.en: but he wouldn't have complained about it anyway.
translation.zh: 可是他从来不曾埋怨过

translation.en: He wasn't like that.
Well, I'm gonna need to get some contact information, next of kin.
translation.zh: 我想跟你索取他近亲的联络方式

translation.en: He doesn't have any family.
No?
No.
I'm sorry for your loss.
If you have any questions...
just give me a call.
Leonard once told me he wanted to be cremated.
translation.zh: 莱纳德曾跟我说过他死后希望可以被火化

translation.en: He wanted his ashes spread in the garden.
translation.zh: 然后把骨灰洒在院子里

translation.en: Let me get back to you.
Okay.
Thank you.
Where are you going?
I have to talk to Mr. Calvern to get my name back on the list.
translation.zh: 我要去找凯文先生谈谈请他把我的名字放回名单内

translation.en: What list?
At the agency.
For another position.
Why?
Because that's what I should do,
now that I don't have a job.
If you don't hear back about that job soon,
translation.zh: 要是那家公司再没有消息

translation.en: maybe you should start looking again too.
translation.zh: 也许你应该开始找工作了

translation.en: All right. I will.
-I'll see you later. -Okay.
Katie, I am so sorry. The two of you were so close.
translation.zh: 凯蒂 我感到十分难过毕竟你们俩的关系非常亲近

translation.en: I can't imagine what a shock it was.
translation.zh: 我无法想象你受到的惊吓

translation.en: If there's anything I can do...
I would like to get another assignment as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 我希望能尽快找到另一份工作

translation.en: -Oh, okay. Well, let's talk in my office. -Okay.
translation.zh: -原来如此 到我办公室说吧-好的

translation.en: UNKNOWN
Hello?
Speaking.
Oh! Hi, yeah.
I agree. I thought the interview went very--
translation.zh: 对啊 我也认为那场面试很顺利…

translation.en: I see.
Yeah, no, I completely understand.
Thank you for calling.
Yeah, you too.
Katie, I assumed you knew. I can't put you back to work,
translation.zh: 凯蒂 我以为你知情我不能马上让你回来工作

translation.en: not until the police finish their investigation.
translation.zh: 至少要等到警方完成调查以后

translation.en: Investigation?
Well, yes, when a client expires under the supervision of an employee,
translation.zh: 要是客户在职员监护期间过世

translation.en: we cooperate with the authorities to be absolutely certain that there was...
translation.zh: 我们就必须配合执法单位调查以确保过程中…

translation.en: you know, how would it look to a potential client that there was even any hint of--
translation.zh: 如果旗下职员可能…你认为潜在客户会怎么看？

translation.en: Wait, you think I had something to do with what happened to Leonard?
translation.zh: 等一下你怀疑我跟莱纳德的死有关？

translation.en: God, no. No, of course not.
translation.zh: 天啊 不是 当然不是

translation.en: No. This is...
I'm sorry, Katie. This is company policy.
translation.zh: 对不起 凯蒂 这是公司制度

translation.en: There's nothing I can do until the police officially close their investigation.
translation.zh: 在警方结案前 我什么也做不了

translation.en: So, how long is this gonna take?
Yeah, I--
I wish I knew.
Hello?
Hey.
What were you thinking?
You can't just come in here like this, like we still belong here.
translation.zh: 你不能随便进来这间房子就像我们还属于这里似的

translation.en: Excuse me. I'm bleeding right now. What do you want from me?
translation.zh: 不好意思 我流血了你到底想要我怎么做？

translation.en: We said we'd be careful, Adam!
translation.zh: 亚当 我们说好要谨慎处理的！

translation.en: I asked you and you promised me.
translation.zh: 我跟你说好了 你也答应我了

translation.en: -You promised. -All right. Okay!
translation.zh: -你答应过我的！-好了 我知道！

translation.en: Look, I--
I'm sorry.
But if I wasn't here, I think that money would be gone.
translation.zh: 但要不是我来了我相信那笔钱已经不见了

translation.en: How could anyone know about the money?
translation.zh: 怎么会有其他人知道这笔钱？

translation.en: -It's Leonard's. He kept it hidden. -Why else would they be here, Katie?
translation.zh: -那是莱纳德的钱 他把钱藏得好好的-那他们来干什么？

translation.en: You didn't see who it was?
translation.zh: 你没看见对方的样貌吗？

translation.en: No, they came up behind me.
They couldn't have known you were here.
translation.zh: 他们肯定不知道你在屋里

translation.en: They wouldn't have busted in like that.
translation.zh: 不然就不会贸然闯进来

translation.en: I heard the glass break. That's why I came down.
translation.zh: 我听见玻璃碎掉的声音所以才下楼查看

translation.en: The back door was already open.
And you didn't think maybe that was a bad sign,
translation.zh: 你当时没有不祥的预感吗？

translation.en: that you should get out?
No, I didn't have time to think.
The next thing I know, I was waking up to the sound of my phone ringing.
translation.zh: 待我恢复知觉时就被手机铃声吵醒了

translation.en: How could you do this, Adam? This never should have happened.
translation.zh: 亚当 你怎么可以这么做？这种事根本不应该发生

translation.en: You never should have been here.
translation.zh: 你根本不应该出现在屋里

translation.en: -That's not the point! -Then what's the point?
-Almost a hundred grand! That's the point. -You're always trying to justify your--
translation.zh: -重点是屋里有将近十万美元-你老是有理由说服自己…

translation.en: You counted it?
I counted to 92,000, and there was more.
translation.zh: 我算到九万两千美元 还有更多

translation.en: Then she calls me to say how sorry she is
translation.zh: 然后她打来不断向我道歉

translation.en: that the hiring committee decided to go another way.
translation.zh: 她说招聘委员会另外有了决定

translation.en: Whatever the hell that means.
I don't even know...
They're all just such assholes.
I'm just sick of being poor.
Who was it, Adam?
Who got in here?
Maybe somebody who did some work on the house?
translation.zh: 可能是以前在这间房子里工作的人？

translation.en: -Sometime before you started. -Leonard talked about hiring a gardener,
translation.zh: -在你还没来之前-莱纳德说过他曾雇用过一个园丁

translation.en: but that was a couple of years ago.
translation.zh: 但那是好几年前的事了

translation.en: Well, whoever it was, I don't think it was a coincidence.
translation.zh: 无论对方是谁 我相信这不是个巧合

translation.en: They must have known that Leonard had passed away.
translation.zh: 对方肯定知道莱纳德过世了

translation.en: And figured the house would be empty.
Yeah.
But maybe you're right.
Maybe they didn't know about the money.
translation.zh: 也许他们并不知道屋里有钱

translation.en: They probably just wanted to get in and get out.
translation.zh: 他们只想进屋碰碰运气

translation.en: Just grab whatever they can get away with.
What if they come back?
[cashier] All right, right this way.
There you go.
Just ring when you're ready.
Thank you.
[Adam] Babe.
[Adam] Dinner's on me.
[Katie] All right.
-Morning. -Morning.
I was just making you coffee.
Ms. Franklin, this is Detective Chesler. We spoke at Mr. Wellsley's house.
translation.zh: 富兰克林小姐 我是切斯勒警探我们在韦斯利先生家见过

translation.en: Would you give me a call when you get this message?
translation.zh: 收到这则语音信息后介意联络我吗？

translation.en: You have the number. Thanks.
translation.zh: 联络号码已经给你了 谢谢

translation.en: Sorry to keep you waiting. Thanks for coming in.
translation.zh: 抱歉让你久等了 感谢你抽空前来

translation.en: Detective. Is there a problem?
Why don't we talk back here?
Did Mr. Wellsley ever mention a will?
translation.zh: 韦斯利先生曾跟你提过遗产的事吗？

translation.en: No.
And no family?
He was all alone.
translation.zh: 他一直都是自己一个人

translation.en: Well, something like this,
the rich old man, living alone, no heirs. We just have to cross all of our t's.
translation.zh: 一个富有的独居老人 没有继承人我们只是要确认资料

translation.en: I'm sorry, Detective.
[stammers] I don't...
What is this about?
Well, you said that Mr. Wellsley asked to be cremated.
translation.zh: 你说过韦斯利先生希望死后被火化

translation.en: So I'm assuming that you want to honor his request.
translation.zh: 我就假设你想要完成他的心愿

translation.en: Yes.
Yes, we do.
Without a family and no will,
translation.zh: 既然没有家人 也没有遗嘱

translation.en: the question becomes who bears the cost of the arrangements.
translation.zh: 那问题是谁应该支付这笔身后事费用

translation.en: We'll take care of Leonard.
translation.zh: 我们会处理莱纳德的身后事

translation.en: Okay. I've got the paperwork right here.
translation.zh: 好吧 我已经把证件准备好了

translation.en: [Adam] What's that?
[Katie] His favorite tea.
Thanks.
For Leonard.
Leonard.
We should put the money back.
It doesn't feel right.
Let's just be here.
For Leonard.
[Katie] We should say something.
"And he shall be like a tree,
planted by the rivers of water.
That bringeth forth his fruit in his season
translation.zh: 按时候结果子 叶子也不干枯

translation.en: and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper."
I'm sorry. Who are you?
translation.zh: 不好意思 请问你是谁？

translation.en: Apologies, Ms. Franklin. My name is Julia Byron-Kim.
translation.zh: 不好意思 富兰克林小姐我叫朱莉娅拜伦金

translation.en: I'm Mr. Wellsley's attorney.
translation.zh: 我是韦斯利先生的律师

translation.en: Ms. Byron-Kim,
Leonard never said anything about an attorney.
translation.zh: 莱纳德从来不曾提过他有一名律师

translation.en: Please, call me Julia. And I'm not surprised.
translation.zh: 叫我朱莉娅就行了他没告诉你 我不感到意外

translation.en: [Adam] What do you mean?
The first I heard from Mr. Wellsley was only a few weeks ago.
translation.zh: 我也是在几个星期前才认识他的

translation.en: He called me out of the blue, wanting me to write up his will,
translation.zh: 他突然打给我 叫我为他立遗嘱

translation.en: and asked me to come to the house.
-I never saw you here. -He was very specific about that.
translation.zh: -我不曾见过你-他对这件事保密到家

translation.en: I was to only come in the evenings.
Why?
He left everything to you.
translation.zh: 他把所有财产都留给你了

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -Congratulations.
[laughing] Oh, my God!
I don't even know what to say. This is...
translation.zh: 我不知道该说什么了 这简直…

translation.en: Say thank you, Leonard!
translation.zh: 就说：“谢谢你 莱纳德！”

translation.en: Wow.
Okay, so what happens now?
translation.zh: 好吧 那现在该怎么做？

translation.en: First, I suggest you read over the will very carefully.
translation.zh: 首先 我建议你仔细阅读遗产内容

translation.en: Better yet, I would have your lawyer take a look.
translation.zh: 最好能请你的律师过目

translation.en: Actually, we don't have a lawyer.
Well, Mr. Wellsley did pay my retainer in advance,
translation.zh: 韦斯利先生已经支付我一笔律师费

translation.en: asked that I help you through this transition.
translation.zh: 要我协助你们度过过渡期

translation.en: What transition? We can't just move in right away?
translation.zh: 过渡期？不能马上搬进来吗？

translation.en: Of course you can,
with the understanding that the will is going through probate,
translation.zh: 前提是你们要理解这份遗嘱必须经过验证

translation.en: which takes about three months.
translation.zh: 整个过程大概要三个月

translation.en: And if there are any surprises,
you should have someone to look after your interests.
translation.zh: 你应该找个律师来保障你的权益

translation.en: Now, I understand if you want to find your own lawyer.
translation.zh: 如果你想另聘律师 我会理解

translation.en: You said Leonard called you out of the blue.
translation.zh: 你说莱纳德突然联络你

translation.en: You didn't know him?
I never met him before.
Why did he call you?
He found me on the Internet.
He said that he liked my name.
Byron was his favorite poet.
translation.zh: 拜伦是他最欣赏的诗人

translation.en: Ms. Byron-Kim.
Sorry, Julia...
translation.zh: 抱歉 应该称呼你朱莉娅才对

translation.en: I'm kind of new at this.
I'm not really sure how to go about it officially,
translation.zh: 我不清楚怎么办理正当手续

translation.en: but I could really use your help.
There are some big changes coming your way.
translation.zh: 你的人生将迎来重大的变化

translation.en: I hope you're ready.
Me too.
And how about Adam?
What about him?
Well, he does understand that legally,
translation.zh: 他必须明白 在法律上

translation.en: where it comes to this house, you make all the decisions.
translation.zh: 只有你有权决定所有跟这间房子有关的事

translation.en: We've always decided things together.
translation.zh: 我们向来都一起做决定的

translation.en: Which is how it should be.
These things, you just never know how it can change someone.
translation.zh: 你不知道这种事会改变一个人多少

translation.en: We'll be okay.
Good.
-Leave it to me then. -Great.
-Congratulations. -Thanks.
We should take a vacation for a month. Just first class all the way.
translation.zh: 我们应该去度假一个月每趟航班都坐头等舱

translation.en: You'll get your MBA before you know it. Find a great job.
translation.zh: 你很快就能取得工商管理硕士学位然后找份高薪工作

translation.en: -That piece of junk that we drive. -We can pay off everything.
translation.zh: -说到我们开的那辆破车…-我们可以付清所有债务

translation.en: Credit cards, loans, just wipe the slate clean.
translation.zh: 信用卡、贷款 然后重新开始

translation.en: You know, we should go right now. Both of us. Just go pick brand new cars.
translation.zh: 我们应该马上就去车行 买两辆新车

translation.en: -Come on, Adam. I'm serious. -Yeah, me too.
translation.zh: -亚当 我是认真的-对啊 我也是认真的

translation.en: -We can't do that. -Why not? We have the money.
translation.zh: -不能这么做-为什么？我们有钱了

translation.en: We can't just walk in there with all that cash. It'll look weird.
translation.zh: 我们总不能带着一大笔钱贸然走进车行

translation.en: -People are gonna ask questions. -Yeah. No. You're right.
translation.zh: -人们会起疑的-对 没错 你说得对

translation.en: I did some research online and been looking into that.
translation.zh: 我上网找了一些资料最近一直在研究

translation.en: Into what?
See there's ways we can make it work, right? We just spread the money around.
translation.zh: 一定有几个行得通的方案 对吧？我们把钱分散开来

translation.en: Different banks, different kinds of accounts.
translation.zh: 存进不同银行 开立几个账户

translation.en: What are you talking about?
If we do this right, it's like nobody will ever know.
translation.zh: 如果处理得妥当 就不会被人发现

translation.en: We can get away with so much in taxes.
translation.zh: 我们可以少付一大笔税务

translation.en: Adam.
We still have to be careful.
We have been careful, okay?
translation.zh: 我们一直都小心翼翼 不是吗？

translation.en: Don't you think it's time for us to treat ourselves?
translation.zh: 你不觉得是时候好好享受了吗？

translation.en: You earned it.
God knows I have.
I mean maybe you're right, but we have to settle in first,
translation.zh: 也许你说得对但我必须等稳定后再说

translation.en: take things slow, you know. Just...
Just a little while longer. Okay?
Yeah.
Okay.
We'll take it slow.
I'll call the movers. See how soon we can get them over here.
translation.zh: 我会联络搬家工人看他们多久会到

translation.en: What? We don't need any of this stuff.
translation.zh: 怎么了？这些东西都不要了

translation.en: What? It's our stuff. We've had it since we got married.
translation.zh: 什么？这些都是我们的东西结婚后就保留到现在

translation.en: Yeah well, here, we'll keep the pictures and some of those books,
translation.zh: 这幅画…留下这几幅画和一些书

translation.en: and we don't need the rest of this junk.
What are we supposed to do with all of it?
Just leave it for the next poor losers that have to live in this dump, right?
translation.zh: 留给下一个住进这间破房子的窝囊废 好吗？

translation.en: -Jeez, Adam. -[phone rings]
Hello?
Yeah, that was five months ago and I already gave the police my statement.
translation.zh: 没错 那是五个月前的事了我已经向警方录过口供了

translation.en: Who was it who called you, sir?
translation.zh: 先生 打给你的人是谁？

translation.en: I didn't get the name. He just said talk to someone at the front desk.
translation.zh: 我没问过他的名字他叫我到柜台前询问

translation.en: I got nothing.
Mr. Kettner, everything okay?
translation.zh: 凯特纳先生 一切可好？

translation.en: He says somebody told him to come down, make a statement.
translation.zh: 他说有人叫他来警局录口供

translation.en: What's this regarding?
Like five months ago somebody robbed the Smile Diner, killed somebody.
translation.zh: 五个月前有个人闯进微笑餐厅抢劫 还杀了人

translation.en: You were at the diner that night?
Yes.
Lucky you didn't get hurt.
I kinda stopped the guy.
You did?
Yeah, in that situation, I reacted. My wife was working that night so...
translation.zh: 紧要关头 我只能反应我太太在那里值夜班 所以…

translation.en: Ms. Franklin was there too?
Yeah, but what I don't understand is you already have the guy locked up.
translation.zh: 我不明白的是你们已经把那个人关起来了

translation.en: Why do they need another statement?
translation.zh: 为什么还要找我再录口供？

translation.en: They don't.
What are you talking about?
That guy from the diner, Ray Gaskin.
translation.zh: 那个打劫餐厅的人叫雷蒙盖斯金

translation.en: -Yeah. -He's dead.
Somebody stabbed him in his cell a couple weeks ago.
translation.zh: 几个星期前 他在牢房里被人刺死了

translation.en: So who called me?
Kind of wondering that myself.
Excuse me?
Hello, Katie. Do you remember me?
translation.zh: 嗨 凯蒂 还记得我吗？

translation.en: Yeah, what are you doing back here?
I know, a pain in the ass, right? But my client, he's driving me nuts.
translation.zh: 是啊 赶不走的苍蝇 对吧？只是那个客户快把我逼疯了

translation.en: He just-- He absolutely loves the place. I think he wants to make an offer.
translation.zh: 他非常喜欢这间房子我认为他有意买下

translation.en: I told you already.
It's not for sale.
Maybe, if I could speak with the owner myself,
translation.zh: 不然让我跟屋主谈谈吧

translation.en: at least I can say I tried.
translation.zh: 至少我可以说我努力过了

translation.en: Look, I'm really busy and you can't just show up here like this, so...
translation.zh: 我真的很忙 你不能随便出现在这里

translation.en: I want you to go now. Please.
You know, Katie?
This ain't my first rodeo.
translation.zh: 这已经不是我第一场仗了

translation.en: You know, one of the first lessons in real estate...
translation.zh: 在房地产界混迹多年我学会的第一堂课就是

translation.en: if you want to find new listings,
check the obituaries.
I know all about the late Mr. Wellsley.
translation.zh: 我非常了解已故的韦斯利先生

translation.en: Sad.
The house isn't for sale.
You know, I've had my eye on this house for a couple years.
translation.zh: 我盯着这间房子好几年了

translation.en: The old man...
kicks the bucket...
and you think you can just move in?
translation.zh: 你以为自己可以随意搬进去住吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna smile? Wish you well?
I own the house now.
What the hell are you saying?
Leonard left it to me.
translation.zh: 莱纳德把房子留给了我

translation.en: I have his will, I can prove it.
translation.zh: 遗嘱在我手上 我可以证明

translation.en: Yeah, well for five grand
I can make a new will that says it belongs to my dear Aunt Myrtle.
translation.zh: 我也可以另立遗嘱说房子属于我那个默特尔姨婆

translation.en: I have a lawyer.
Of course you do.
If you have any more questions, I suggest you talk to her
translation.zh: 如果你还有问题的话 不妨去跟她聊

translation.en: but, in the meantime, get the hell off my property before I call the police.
translation.zh: 但请你马上滚出我的家不然我就报警了

translation.en: All right. Well, I guess I'll see you around, Katie.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我们下次再见 凯蒂

translation.en: He's just messing with you.
It's not how it sounded.
He practically accused me of forging the will.
Babe, trust me.
The thing this guy cares about is what he's losing on commission.
translation.zh: 这个人只在乎他能不能得到那笔佣金

translation.en: Maybe I should talk to Julia.
translation.zh: 也许我应该找朱莉娅谈谈

translation.en: The lawyer?
Why?
In case Hayden tries to make trouble?
translation.zh: 我担心海登想要惹是生非

translation.en: What could he do?
I don't know but it's like she said, we don't want any surprises right now.
translation.zh: 我也不知道 但朱莉娅说过我们要避免任何意外

translation.en: Katie.
This guy is just pissed off. Forget about him.
translation.zh: 这个人只是气疯了 别当他是一回事

translation.en: Come on.
It's our first night in our new house.
translation.zh: 这是我们搬进新房子的第一夜

translation.en: We should celebrate.
Yeah?
What did you have in mind?
I can think of something.
-Let me take a shower first. -What?
I've been cleaning the house all day. I'll be right out.
translation.zh: 我一整天都在清理房子 马上就好

translation.en: What is this?
My old one stopped working, so...
translation.zh: 旧手表坏了 所以我…

translation.en: Looks expensive.
Well, it's a knock off.
Just bought it from some guy downtown.
translation.zh: 从城里某个人手中买来的

translation.en: Very convincing.
You want company?
I'll be right out.
Detective!
-Looks like I came at a bad time. -No, you're fine. Come in.
translation.zh: -我好像来得不是时候-不会 没关系 进来吧

translation.en: You folks going somewhere?
Yeah, we're moving, actually, into Leonard's house.
translation.zh: 其实我们要搬走了 搬去莱纳德的家

translation.en: Leonard?
As in Mr. Wellsley?
I know. I'm still getting used to the idea myself.
translation.zh: 我知道 我还在适应这个称呼

translation.en: Leonard left it to me in his will.
translation.zh: 莱纳德生前立遗嘱把房子留给我

translation.en: Now then, that is a very nice house.
translation.zh: 原来如此 那是一间非常漂亮的房子

translation.en: Yes, it is.
-Congratulations. -Thank you.
So, a thing like that, what do they call it?
A windfall.
Doesn't happen every day.
Nope.
Funny you forgot to mention it.
translation.zh: 奇怪的是 你没提过

translation.en: What?
The will, and all, when we spoke.
translation.zh: 我们当初约谈时 你没提到遗嘱的事

translation.en: I asked you about his family, about a will.
translation.zh: 我问过你他有没有家人和遗嘱

translation.en: Oh no, I didn't know about it until after the service. His lawyer came by.
translation.zh: 不是 我也是在丧礼后才发现的他的律师来找我

translation.en: That must've been quite a shock.
Yeah, it was.
I'd have loved to see the look on your face.
translation.zh: 我真希望能看到你当时的表情

translation.en: You know, I mean you worked there for...
what did you say? Four months?
Why are you here, Detective?
I was hoping to speak with your husband.
translation.zh: 我有事要问问你的丈夫

translation.en: He's not here.
Well, maybe you can help me.
See, I was wondering
when you worked nights at that place, the Smile Diner,
translation.zh: 你在微笑餐厅值夜班期间

translation.en: did he pick you up all the time?
translation.zh: 他是不是经常去接你下班？

translation.en: I mean, he picked you up before.
Yeah.
Right, but was it a set thing?
Was it every night, was it certain nights?
translation.zh: 是不是每晚都去接你？还是只是偶尔去接你？

translation.en: No, not exactly.
So how did he happen to be there that night?
translation.zh: 那他当晚为什么会在场？

translation.en: I-- I called him to pick me up and he came early to study.
translation.zh: 我打去叫他来接我他提早到 在餐厅里温习

translation.en: Well, you ought to play the lottery, Katie.
translation.zh: 凯蒂 你该去买彩票才对

translation.en: You're a very lucky woman.
translation.zh: 你是个运气非常好的女人

translation.en: Does this have anything to do with the fact that
translation.zh: 这件事跟警方当初打来

translation.en: the police called Adam about making another statement?
translation.zh: 叫亚当到警局录口供有关吗？

translation.en: He didn't tell you?
Police never called Adam.
No, I was here. They called him down at the station.
translation.zh: 不对 警方打来时 我也在场

translation.en: No, I checked it out after he left.
translation.zh: 他离开警局后 我查过记录

translation.en: There's no record of any calls to his number.
translation.zh: 没记录显示警方曾打给他

translation.en: That doesn't make any sense. Why would-- Why would anyone...
translation.zh: 那也太没道理了 为什么有人要…

translation.en: send him down there for no reason?
translation.zh: 无缘无故叫他去警局呢？

translation.en: Well, maybe they had a reason.
Maybe it's just not the one you think.
translation.zh: 只是跟你想的原因不一样

translation.en: Take care now.
[Katie] Thanks, Julia. I'll talk to you later, bye.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 朱莉娅 再联络 再见

translation.en: Katie.
What did she want?
I called her, actually.
What did you tell her?
Nothing.
That's not how it looked.
Looked like you guys were best friends all of a sudden.
translation.zh: 你们俩的友情好像一日千里啊

translation.en: Well, maybe if you'd been here, maybe if you'd answered your phone...
translation.zh: 如果你刚才在家或是有接听我打去的电话…

translation.en: We agreed.
We decided you were not going to talk to her.
translation.zh: 我们说好不要告诉她的

translation.en: No, you decided.
Like you've been deciding a lot of things lately.
translation.zh: 最近很多事都由你决定呢

translation.en: What are you even talking about?
Why didn't you tell me that it wasn't the police who called you?
translation.zh: 你为什么没告诉我那天不是警方打来？

translation.en: It was somebody else who made sure you went down there, right?
translation.zh: 是不是有人打来要你非去警局不可？

translation.en: Who told you that?
Detective Chesler dropped by.
And she was asking a lot of questions,
about you,
about what happened the night of the diner.
What is that about,
Adam?
[scoffs] How should I know?
Who called?
-Who sent you to the police station? -I don't know!
My bad, I was gonna tell you about it.
translation.zh: 那是我的错 我本来打算告诉你了

translation.en: It's a whole lot of other stuff has been happening right now.
What other stuff?
I think I'm being followed.
What?
I kind of had the feeling before.
Today, I just went driving around, just around.
translation.zh: 今天我开车到处兜风时

translation.en: I kept seeing the same car.
Did you go to the bank?
-Come on, we said we would not do that. -No, Adam. No bullshit.
translation.zh: -别闹了 我们说好不去领钱了-亚当 别骗我

translation.en: Just tell me. Did you go to the bank today?
translation.zh: 告诉我 你今天是不是去了银行？

translation.en: Did you take money out?
I noticed him.
So I figured, you know, it wouldn't be a good idea. Just in case.
translation.zh: 于是我心想 去领钱不合适 以防万一

translation.en: In case he was after the money.
-We don't know that. -Why else is he watching you?
translation.zh: -谁知道呢？-不然他为什么监视你？

translation.en: Look, maybe I'm just paranoid.
Okay? Maybe there's nobody who's following me. I don't know.
translation.zh: 对吧？也许根本没有人跟踪我我也不知道

translation.en: You got sent down to the police station, Adam.
translation.zh: 亚当 有人叫你去警局

translation.en: That way, I'm here alone.
translation.zh: 你走了以后 我一个人待在屋里

translation.en: That way, Hayden shows up, tries to intimidate me,
translation.zh: 海登突然出现 企图威胁我

translation.en: scare us out of the house. What is that? Why is he here?
translation.zh: 想把我们吓跑 到底怎么回事？他为什么会出现？

translation.en: Because he probably knows.
I warned you.
Chesler.
Hey, Tom.
You did?
Great.
Great, okay. Hold on.
All right, so probably just from the last four, five months.
We're looking for any checks drawn on an account from a Leonard Wellsley.
translation.zh: 我们想查看莱纳德韦斯利账户的支票转账记录

translation.en: Yeah, made out to her name.
translation.zh: 对 受款人是她的名字

translation.en: Yeah.
It's Kate... Franklin.
Listen, can you see what you got on the husband too?
translation.zh: 听好 能不能弄到她丈夫的资料？

translation.en: It's a different last name.
It's an Adam Kettner with a "K."
Great, get back to me as soon as you can. Thanks.
What are you looking for?
Leonard didn't just stash that money.
translation.zh: 莱纳德不可能把那笔钱藏起来

translation.en: It had to come from somewhere. There has to be a reason.
translation.zh: 肯定有个出处 肯定有个理由

translation.en: Does that even matter now?
Julia said...
if they find out we've been hiding something illegal,
translation.zh: 要是他们发现我们私藏某些物件

translation.en: we could lose everything.
translation.zh: 我们就可能会失去一切

translation.en: All right.
So what do you suggest? We just give it all back?
translation.zh: 你有什么想法？把钱交出来吗？

translation.en: I don't know.
Yeah, maybe.
-To whom, Katie? -I don't know!
translation.zh: -交给谁呢 凯蒂？-我不知道！

translation.en: But this never felt right.
translation.zh: 但我总觉得这么做不对

translation.en: I'm not going back to the way things were before.
translation.zh: 我不想回去以前的时候

translation.en: Adam.
We may not have a choice.
We always have a choice.
I had absolutely no idea that Mr. Wellsley left Katie the house.
translation.zh: 我完全不理解韦斯利先生为什么会把房子留给凯蒂

translation.en: That seems a little...
excessive.
Doesn't it, though?
What can you tell me about her husband?
I've never met the man.
So you had nothing to do with hiring him?
As a gardener at the house.
No. It's strictly against our policy for family members to work together.
translation.zh: 不曾 公司规定职员家属不准一起工作

translation.en: Our patients are elderly, infirm.
translation.zh: 毕竟客户都是年老体弱的个案

translation.en: We can't risk that kind of potential distraction.
So, do you know of Ms. Franklin ever breaking the rules before?
translation.zh: 那你知道富兰克林小姐违反公司规定的事吗？

translation.en: Never, no.
No, she absolutely understood the importance of her job, especially... with Mr. Wellsley.
translation.zh: 她绝对明白自身职责的重要性尤其服务对象是韦斯利先生

translation.en: Why especially him?
Well, you wouldn't have known it to look at him, but his health was very delicate.
translation.zh: 他的健康状况非常不好只是外表上看不出

translation.en: You know, Katie told me, she kept a notebook,
translation.zh: 凯蒂曾跟我说过 她有一本笔记簿

translation.en: like, a daily log, just to keep track of his medication.
translation.zh: 就像记录簿一样她每天都会把他的用药情况记录起来

translation.en: Do you happen to have a record of his medications?
translation.zh: 你有没有他的用药记录？

translation.en: You'd have to speak with his doctor about that.
translation.zh: 这点你要去问他的医生

translation.en: Right. How about Ms. Franklin's contract, how much she was being paid?
translation.zh: 好吧 说说富兰克林小姐的雇员合同她的薪水是多少？

translation.en: Yeah, sure, we can get that to you.
translation.zh: 没问题 我们可以给你

translation.en: -Yeah. -Excellent. Thank you. And let me...
translation.zh: -可以-太好了 谢谢你 我想…

translation.en: just ask you. Did she...
translation.zh: 我想问你一件事 她有没有…

translation.en: Did she ever mention a raise?
translation.zh: 她有没有跟你提过起薪的事？

translation.en: Good lord.
She deposited that check just before Wellsley died.
translation.zh: 她在韦斯利死前去兑现了这张支票

translation.en: Was she really taking money from that poor old man all along?
translation.zh: 难道她确实一直在骗取那个可怜老人的钱？

translation.en: It's a good question.
Adam?
Adam!
Shit!
Ethan?
These were never cashed.
You okay?
I think I know who that is.
translation.zh: 我应该知道是谁在搞鬼了

translation.en: What?
Leonard said something about hiring a gardener.
translation.zh: 莱纳德说他曾雇用过一个园丁

translation.en: I think I told you about this.
translation.zh: 我好像跟你提过这件事

translation.en: A guy named Ethan. This was a couple years ago.
translation.zh: 那个人叫伊桑好几年前曾在这里当园丁

translation.en: So he's been up there for a while.
translation.zh: 他藏在那里好一阵子了

translation.en: There were checks made out to Ethan Doyle.
translation.zh: 我找到几张为伊桑道尔开立的支票

translation.en: They were never cashed.
Leonard said, one day, he just stopped showing up.
translation.zh: 莱纳德说过 后来他无端端没来了

translation.en: Never heard from him again.
Somebody shot him.
You looked?
He must have bled to death up there.
translation.zh: 他肯定是失血过多而死的

translation.en: He was murdered.
Yeah. I think so.
But...
Leonard couldn't have known he was there.
translation.zh: 莱纳德应该不知道他在屋里

translation.en: Right? I mean, he would have helped him.
And why would Doyle hide out in the shed? Why not... come into the house?
translation.zh: 为什么道尔要躲在那间小屋里？为什么不跑进屋里？

translation.en: Maybe these have something to do with it.
Take a guess.
Wow.
-Do you think they're real? -Why else would he hide them?
translation.zh: -是真钻吗？-不然他为什么要藏起来？

translation.en: Shit!
Here! Just--
-Oh, God! -Oh, my God.
Give them here. Come on.
-I'm sorry. -Dammit.
-Don't answer. -[Mr. Calvern] I saw your car.
But I can't. My car is parked outside. They know I'm here.
translation.zh: 不行 我的车停在屋外他们知道我在家

translation.en: -Okay, I'm just gonna... -I got it.
translation.zh: -好吧 我过去一下…-交给我吧

translation.en: [Mr. Calvern] Open the door! Do you hear me? Katie!
translation.zh: 快开门 听见了吗？凯蒂！

translation.en: [Mr. Calvern] Katie, open the door please!
I'm sorry. This really isn't a good time.
translation.zh: 不好意思 现在不是时候

translation.en: Well, yeah. I'm sure you're very busy settling into your new home.
translation.zh: 是啊 我相信你在忙着搬进新房里住

translation.en: You should be ashamed of yourself.
translation.zh: 你应该为自己的行为感到羞耻

translation.en: How could you take advantage of that poor man?
translation.zh: 你怎么可以占一个可怜老人的便宜？

translation.en: -What? -Look, I knew something was up.
translation.zh: -什么？-听好 我就知道不对劲

translation.en: I could feel it.
But you know what? You had him so frightened he couldn't even tell me.
translation.zh: 你把他吓坏了 他根本不敢告诉我

translation.en: It's not-- No!
I'm not letting you tarnish my company's good name.
translation.zh: 我绝对不会让你毁掉我公司的名声！

translation.en: -Mr. Calvern-- -I'll find proof!
translation.zh: -凯文先生…-我一定会找到证据！

translation.en: I'm gonna call the police!
-I'm gonna have you arrested! -This really isn't a good time.
translation.zh: -让你被警方带走！-现在真的不是时候

translation.en: [shouting] This isn't over, Katie!
translation.zh: 凯蒂 我不会放过你的！

translation.en: I'll be back!
I'm gonna find out what's been going on in this house, one way or another!
translation.zh: 我一定会设法找出这间房子究竟是怎么回事！

translation.en: I'm not letting this go! You hear me? I'm not gonna lose my business over this!
translation.zh: 我不会轻易放过你的 听见了吗？我不会因为这件事影响生意的

translation.en: Why isn't this full?
[Adam] Katie?
[Adam] Hey, Katie!
Hey.
-Didn't you hear me? -Hi, sorry. I was making tea.
translation.zh: -没听见我叫你吗？-不好意思 我刚才在泡茶呢

translation.en: You want some?
No. I got you a present.
translation.zh: 不了 我给你买了礼物

translation.en: A new phone?
Yeah. Got one for each of us.
New numbers too. I figured the way things were going,
translation.zh: 还办了新的手机号码发生了这么多事

translation.en: we could both use a little privacy.
translation.zh: 我发现我们需要一些私隐

translation.en: We can't keep them.
-Katie-- -Adam, no.
There is a dead man out there. He was murdered.
translation.zh: 外面有个死人 他是被杀害的

translation.en: He stole those diamonds.
And who knows what else he may have done, who he may have hurt.
translation.zh: 天晓得他还做过什么事伤害过什么人

translation.en: These things don't just go away like they never happened.
translation.zh: 这些事不会消失就像不曾发生过一样

translation.en: -The police must be looking for him. -Don't you get this?
translation.zh: -警察肯定在找他-你不明白吗？

translation.en: Doyle stole the diamonds,
got himself shot, and then he died out there all by himself.
translation.zh: 被枪击中 自己回到小屋里死了

translation.en: It's like-- It's like he fell down a well.
translation.zh: 就像不小心跌落井底死了

translation.en: Two years later,
nobody knows what happened to him or the diamonds. We can do whatever we want.
translation.zh: 再也没有人记得他和那批钻石我们想做什么都可以

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I'm calling Detective Chesler.
-We need to tell her-- -No! Wait!
translation.zh: -我们要告诉她…-不要 等一下！

translation.en: Wait, just-- Okay, hang on. Just listen to me for just a second.
translation.zh: 慢着 等一下 你先听我说

translation.en: Okay, ask yourself. What the heck was Doyle doing here in the first place?
translation.zh: 你问问自己道尔起初为什么来到这里？

translation.en: Why take some crappy gardening job
translation.zh: 他竟然偷了一批价值连城的钻石

translation.en: if he's planning to steal a fortune in diamonds?
translation.zh: 为什么要去当一个穷园丁？

translation.en: I don't know.
Some old guy's house digging up weeds
translation.zh: 因为到一个老人家去除草

translation.en: is the last place that anybody's gonna come looking for him.
I mean, think about it. Why else wouldn't he cash the checks?
translation.zh: 想想看 他为什么不拿支票去兑现？

translation.en: He didn't want to leave a paper trail.
That way he sets up the big score.
Nobody knows about this place and he can just hide here
translation.zh: 没有人知道这个地方所以他可以躲在这里

translation.en: for as long as he needs to.
Although, I'm sure that getting shot and dying out there
translation.zh: 虽然我相信中枪身亡一事

translation.en: -was probably not a part of the plan. -That doesn't change anything.
translation.zh: -并不在他的计划中-但那改变不了事实

translation.en: We can't keep those diamonds.
All right, so what about the money?
translation.zh: 好吧 那些钱怎么办？

translation.en: What are we gonna do about that?
What do you mean?
If we do this, then the police put us under a microscope,
translation.zh: 要是我们举报这件事警方就会把我们放在显微镜下

translation.en: so how is that going to look?
We took the money from here and then we hid it in the bank.
translation.zh: 我们把钱从屋里带走然后藏进银行里

translation.en: What are they gonna think?
We'll explain it to them.
translation.zh: 我们就解释给他们听啊

translation.en: Tell them it was Leonard's money, that it was his safety net.
translation.zh: 就说那笔钱是莱纳德用来旁身的钱

translation.en: All right, and then what?
'Cause you heard what the lawyer said. Even if they believe us,
translation.zh: 你没听见那个律师怎么说吗？就算他们相信我们

translation.en: even if we don't end up in jail, we could still lose this place.
translation.zh: 就算我们没坐牢我们还是有可能会失去这间房子

translation.en: We don't need this house, Adam!
translation.zh: 亚当 我们不需要这间房子！

translation.en: We don't need any of this.
translation.zh: 这些东西我们都不需要

translation.en: Okay? As long as we have each other,
we're going to be all right.
All right?
I'm done with all right.
That's not enough anymore.
I told you. I'm not going back to the way things were before.
translation.zh: 我说过了 我不想回去以前的时候

translation.en: And what about that man out there? What are we supposed to do about that?
translation.zh: 那外面那个人怎么办？我们要怎么处理？

translation.en: Pretend it never happened?
translation.zh: 假装什么事都没发生过吗？

translation.en: I'll take care of it.
How? How are you gonna do that?
translation.zh: 怎么处理？你打算怎么处理？

translation.en: This house belongs to us now.
translation.zh: 这已经是我们的房子了

translation.en: Okay, this is our future.
I'm not gonna let anybody take that away from us.
translation.zh: 我绝对不会允许任何人把它从我身边带走

translation.en: Look, everything is gonna be okay.
I'll take care of this for you.
[whispering] What are you doing?
[whispering] Someone's in the house.
[whispering] Where did you get that?
[whispering] Adam.
-[whispering] Don't. -[whispering] Don't move.
[whispering] We need to call 911.
Freeze, asshole!
Oh, my God.
Calvern.
How are you holding up, Katie?
Detective Chesler.
Hell of a thing.
It was an accident.
Yeah, that's what they're saying.
translation.zh: 对啊 他们是这么说的

translation.en: Either way, law says it's self-defense, so...
translation.zh: 无论如何法律上 这是自卫行为 所以…

translation.en: It still makes you wonder.
What was going through his head?
Why would he do something like that?
Just let himself into the house?
I don't know.
Something had to set him off.
I know none of this is you, Katie.
translation.zh: 凯蒂 我知道这些事与你无关

translation.en: What?
Everything was fine around here until Adam started work.
translation.zh: 一切都好好的直到亚当开始工作为止

translation.en: So you can tell me whatever is going on.
I know that none of it is you.
translation.zh: 我知道这些事与你无关

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about.
I know about your money problems.
translation.zh: 我知道你碰上经济状况

translation.en: I know what that does to people.
translation.zh: 我也知道钱足以改变一个人

translation.en: I know about the big check that you deposited from Mr. Wellsley.
translation.zh: 我知道你把韦斯利先生给你的一大笔薪资汇入银行账户

translation.en: You don't understand.
Okay, don't say anything, Katie. Just--
translation.zh: 凯蒂 先别说话 请你…

translation.en: Just listen for a second.
Because...
could be that...
it was a loan,
maybe it was a gift, who's to say?
translation.zh: 也可能是他送你的钱没个准 对吧？

translation.en: But I want you to put yourself in my shoes.
translation.zh: 但我要你站在我的角度去看

translation.en: The big picture.
How all of a sudden, everything just drops in your lap.
translation.zh: 为什么突然之间所有好事都降临在你身上？

translation.en: -I told you-- -I mean, here I am,
the coroner tells me that the old guy died in his sleep.
translation.zh: 是因为法医告诉我那个老人是在睡梦中死去的

translation.en: You tell me what his last wish was. And I figure, sure, why not?
translation.zh: 你告诉我他的遗愿是什么我心想：“好啊 何乐不为？”

translation.en: But it is not until after he's cremated
that you find a will.
I didn't find it, I didn't even know about it.
translation.zh: 不是我去找出来的 我完全不知情

translation.en: And I don't even have a body.
I can't even prove that he didn't die a natural death.
translation.zh: 我根本无法证明他是不是自然死亡

translation.en: I mean I gotta tell you, it's starting to keep me up at night.
translation.zh: 我必须告诉你 想到这件事我晚上开始失眠

translation.en: I would never hurt Leonard.
translation.zh: 我绝对不会伤害莱纳德

translation.en: I am not talking about you.
What?
Has Adam ever mentioned anyone by the name of Gaskin, a Ray Gaskin?
translation.zh: 亚当跟你提过一个叫雷蒙盖斯金的人吗？

translation.en: I know that name.
'Cause he tried to rob the diner that night,
translation.zh: 他就是那晚企图抢劫餐厅的人

translation.en: and he also worked as a janitor at the university while Adam was taking classes.
translation.zh: 他也在亚当以前就读的大学里当校工

translation.en: -No, that's not... No. -Okay.
translation.zh: -不是 不可能 不会的-好吧

translation.en: It's a big school. Maybe they never met.
translation.zh: 那是一间规模庞大的大学也许他们不曾见过面

translation.en: But sooner or later...
Adam is going to screw up.
It's only a matter of time.
Don't let him take you down with him.
You come to me.
Baby.
They wanna talk to you.
Hell of a thing.
-Katie! -Hey.
I heard what happened. Are you all right? I've been trying to call you.
translation.zh: 我听说了那件事 你还好吧？我一直想办法联络你

translation.en: My number's been changed.
I need to talk to you.
-Yeah. Come upstairs. -Okay.
And this Detective Chesler, do you believe her?
translation.zh: 这个切斯勒警探 你信得过她吗？

translation.en: Is it possible that Adam had anything to do with what happened at the diner that night?
translation.zh: 那晚发生在餐厅的抢劫案有没有可能跟亚当有关？

translation.en: I don't know what to believe.
translation.zh: 我不知道该相信什么了

translation.en: Did Adam have any problems with Mr. Wellsley?
translation.zh: 亚当和韦斯利先生相处得可好？

translation.en: -Any issues? -No.
No, nothing.
If the police suspect that Adam had anything to do with his death,
translation.zh: 如果警方怀疑亚当跟韦斯利先生的死有关

translation.en: they'll try to find a motive.
translation.zh: 那他们就会设法找出干案动机

translation.en: They're gonna try to claim that he hurried things along.
translation.zh: 指控亚当刻意加速遗嘱继承过程

translation.en: He hated being poor.
Okay, listen to me.
If Chesler thinks she can make a case, she's not gonna waste any time.
translation.zh: 如果切斯勒有意立案那她肯定会把握每分每秒

translation.en: She's gonna try to get a warrant and search the house right away.
translation.zh: 她一定会去申请搜查令立即搜索那间房子

translation.en: Can she do that?
You need to be asking yourself, will she find anything?
translation.zh: 你应该问问自己她会找到什么可疑物吗？

translation.en: You need to promise me.
Promise me
that you'll help Adam too.
It's gone.
What?
The money.
Adam must have taken it.
That's what you found? Cash?
Yeah...
in the attic.
We thought it was stolen at first but...
translation.zh: 我们以为有人要来偷走那笔钱 结果…

translation.en: And then what changed your mind?
The diamonds.
So you found diamonds in the house?
In the living space above the garage.
translation.zh: 在车库二楼的房间里找到的

translation.en: Does Adam have these diamonds?
Yeah.
You need to stop him.
What? Why?
He knows you suspect something. That's why he took the money.
translation.zh: 你知道你怀疑他所以才把钱都带走了

translation.en: He disappears and throws you to the cops.
translation.zh: 然后消失不见 让你去面对警察

translation.en: No, Adam would never do that.
translation.zh: 不会 亚当不会那么做的

translation.en: Are you sure?
You need to find him, bring him to the house and then call me.
translation.zh: 你要去找他 把他带回家 然后打给我

translation.en: -You're not coming with me? -I need to hold off Detective Chesler.
translation.zh: -你不跟我一起去吗？-我要拦住切斯勒警探

translation.en: I don't want her serving the search warrant
translation.zh: 我必须要在亚当回到家以前

translation.en: till we know Adam's in the house.
-Detective Chesler. -Detective Johnson.
What have we got?
Garbage truck was making its rounds this morning, called it in.
translation.zh: 垃圾车今早清运垃圾时发现的之后他们马上报警

translation.en: -How long's he been in there? -ME's still en route.
translation.zh: -在里面多久了？-法医正赶着过来

translation.en: You beat him here.
Damn.
Why did you call me?
There was a backpack next to the vic.
Inside we found an old laundry receipt.
translation.zh: 我们在背包里发现一张洗衣店收据

translation.en: It's pretty faded, but...
translation.zh: 已经严重褪色了 不过…

translation.en: the address matches the name from one of your cases.
translation.zh: 地址上的名字跟你调查的个案相符

translation.en: What's the name?
Leonard Wellsley.
Come on, Adam, pick up.
-Where've you been? -Adam!
I'm up half the night talking to the cops.
translation.zh: 我在警局录口供 整晚没睡

translation.en: I wake up in the morning, you're already gone.
translation.zh: 今早醒来后 你已经离开了

translation.en: There's no note. You haven't answered your phone all day.
translation.zh: 一张纸条也没留下一整天都不接手机

translation.en: -Where've you been, Katie? -The bank.
That's one of the things I need to talk to you about.
translation.zh: 这就是我现在要跟你商量的事

translation.en: -Why did you take the money? -Cause we're in a lot of trouble.
translation.zh: -为什么带走那笔钱？-因为我们惹上大麻烦了

translation.en: Checked up on that real estate agent, Hayden.
translation.zh: 我查过那个叫海登的房地产经理人了

translation.en: I mean, what's this guy's deal?
Why's he so interested in selling this particular house?
translation.zh: 他为什么执意要卖这间房子？

translation.en: Guess what?
There's no record of a Mickey Hayden getting a real estate license.
translation.zh: 房地产经理执照名单上根本没有叫米基海登的人

translation.en: -What? -Yeah. He just got released from prison.
Did a couple years for robbing a jewelry store.
translation.zh: 做了好几年抢劫珠宝勾当

translation.en: Jewelry?
One of those spots downtown. Doesn't even use a gun.
translation.zh: 地点就在市中心 干案时连枪也不带

translation.en: He just sweet talks his way through the security door,
translation.zh: 他花言巧语下 便进入了保安禁区

translation.en: then he blindsides the armed guard,
translation.zh: 然后他动手袭击持武的守卫

translation.en: does some old school, like, smash-and-grab.
translation.zh: 采取老方法 砸橱窗抢劫

translation.en: Sixty seconds, comes out with three million dollars
translation.zh: 在短短60秒内带走价值三百万美元的裸钻

translation.en: in loose diamonds that were never recovered.
translation.zh: 这批钻石到现在还没被寻获

translation.en: -That's why he was here. -Hang on, it gets better.
translation.zh: -所以他才会出现-等一下 精彩的在后头

translation.en: Cops think that he had an accomplice that they never found.
translation.zh: 警方怀疑他有同党 但没查出是谁

translation.en: You wanna take a wild guess?
This other guy gets shot during the burglary, then he gets away.
translation.zh: 在抢劫过程中有个匪徒中枪后逃跑了

translation.en: Doyle got away with the diamonds.
And...
there's only one other person who could've known about it.
translation.zh: 只有另一个人知道实情

translation.en: The one who shot him.
Hayden.
This bastard didn't bother to use a fake name. What did he think?
translation.zh: 他连名字也懒得伪造 他在想什么？

translation.en: We weren't smart enough to figure it out?
translation.zh: 以为我们笨得不会发现吗？

translation.en: We have to call the police.
No, the only thing that we need to do is get the hell out of Dodge.
translation.zh: 不行 如今我们要做的就是逃得远远的

translation.en: We got plenty of travel money, so...
translation.zh: 我们不缺旅费 所以…

translation.en: сan you go pack some stuff up real fast?
translation.zh: 你可以马上去收拾一下吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna go get cleaned up.
You were never gonna leave me.
What? No, why would I ever leave you?
translation.zh: 什么？我为什么要离你而去？

translation.en: Get changed.
Hi, Julia.
It's Katie.
Yeah, he's here, but...
translation.zh: 对 他在家 可是…

translation.en: listen, it wasn't him.
Where are they?
I don't know.
Call him out here.
Adam?
Adam?
Adam!
Right here, baby.
Let her go.
Look, I just want the diamonds.
translation.zh: 听好 我只要那批钻石

translation.en: I said let her go.
I've been waiting a long time for this.
So how about you just tell me where they are?
translation.zh: 不如你直接告诉我钻石在哪吧？

translation.en: Some place you're never gonna find them.
translation.zh: 我放在一个你永远找不到的地方

translation.en: Are you gonna shoot me, kid?
translation.zh: 小子 你打算朝我开枪吧？

translation.en: That's right.
'Cause if I just give you the diamonds, you'll shoot both of us.
translation.zh: 如果我直接把钻石交给你你就会朝我们俩开枪

translation.en: Here's the thing though.
Even if you hit me from there...
translation.zh: 就算你从那边朝我这边开枪

translation.en: my gun's gonna go off, and it's gonna blow a hole in her the size of your head.
translation.zh: 只要我一开枪她头上就多一个跟你的头一样大的洞

translation.en: And we don't want that now, do we?
translation.zh: 我们可不想发生这种事 对吧？

translation.en: So, let's just talk about this.
Adam!
Son of a bitch.
Adam!
No!
Adam!
Baby...
Adam!
Baby!
Please.
Adam.
...in the garden.
Stay with me, baby.
Katie.
Oh, my God.
Here, Katie.
I'm sorry.
Here, sit.
Hey.
Katie, listen.
We need to look for the diamonds before the police get here.
translation.zh: 我们要趁警方找上门前找到那批钻石

translation.en: Do you understand?
It's the only way we can explain what happened without implicating you.
translation.zh: 这样才能说明所发生的一切同时不连累你

translation.en: -Adam never would have hurt Leonard. -Katie, the diamonds.
translation.zh: -亚当绝对不会伤害莱纳德-凯蒂 钻石呢？

translation.en: How could I have ever thought that?
It was Hayden.
Hayden...
killed him with an overdose.
He read the logbook, the one I kept for Leonard's medication.
translation.zh: 他看过那本日志我在上面写下莱纳德的服药记录

translation.en: I found the empty pill bottle.
How do you know it was Hayden?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道是海登做的？

translation.en: Leonard used to tell me all the time that he could hear someone in the house,
translation.zh: 莱纳德曾告诉我说他听到屋里有人走动的声音

translation.en: but I never-- I...
It was Hayden.
Looking for the diamonds.
-He couldn't find them. -But you did?
I don't understand.
Why did Hayden shoot Doyle?
translation.zh: 为什么海登要射杀道尔？

translation.en: Why didn't-- Why didn't he end up with the diamonds?
translation.zh: 为什么钻石不在他身上？

translation.en: Because he wasn't half as smart as he wanted you to think.
translation.zh: 因为他没你想象中那么聪明

translation.en: I mean how smart do you have to be to decide to rip off your partner,
translation.zh: 看到警察到了 竟然跟同党撕破脸

translation.en: shoot him while the cops are rolling up,
translation.zh: 还朝对方开枪 这种人能有多聪明？

translation.en: and he still gets away with three million dollars in diamonds?
translation.zh: 对方还带走了三百万美元的钻石呢

translation.en: Meanwhile, you get busted and spend two years in prison.
translation.zh: 而自己却被关在监狱中两年

translation.en: I never told you how much the diamonds are worth.
translation.zh: 我没跟你说过那批钻石值多少钱

translation.en: Oops.
-What are you doing? -Look, okay, I paid my dues.
Okay, I spent ten years as a public defender.
translation.zh: 当了十年的公设辩护律师

translation.en: How do you think I got Hayden's case?
translation.zh: 你认为我为什么要接下海登的案子？

translation.en: I knew he was an idiot.
translation.zh: 我早就知道他是个蠢货

translation.en: But I believed his story.
And we had an agreement, an understanding, and, of course, he messes everything up.
translation.zh: 我们说好的 已经达成共识了结果被他搞砸了

translation.en: I plea bargained his charges down to two years.
translation.zh: 我在法庭上为他求情将他的刑责减轻至两年

translation.en: I traced Doyle back to when he worked for Leonard.
translation.zh: 我追踪道尔 发现他在为莱纳德工作

translation.en: But the only thing that I couldn't figure out
was where he was.
Turns out Doyle was dead.
You helped kill Leonard?
translation.zh: 你是杀害莱纳德的帮凶？

translation.en: No, I had nothing to do with that, okay? That was all Hayden. He got impatient.
translation.zh: 他的死完全与我无关那是海登的作为 他的耐性越来越少

translation.en: He wanted to hurry things along, but I did have to do some fast maneuvering
translation.zh: 他要赶紧找到钻石为了掩饰他的作为

translation.en: to cover up for him.
The will.
It isn't real, is it?
It's real enough.
With no one to contest it, what's the difference?
translation.zh: 没有竞争对手 跟真的有什么分别？

translation.en: Look, I'm sure Leonard would've given you the house if he was alive,
translation.zh: 我相信如果莱纳德还活着肯定会把房子送给你

translation.en: but that is beside the point.
Right now, I need you to tell me where the diamonds are.
translation.zh: 我要你马上告诉我钻石藏在哪里

translation.en: I don't know.
Katie.
Adam hid them.
I really don't know where they are.
But I wouldn't tell you if I did.
translation.zh: 就算我知道 也不会告诉你

translation.en: You know, that's what I really liked about you.
translation.zh: 这就是我非常喜欢你的原因

translation.en: -[cocks gun] -It was never about the money.
translation.zh: 你从头到尾都不在乎钱

translation.en: But I'm sure they'll turn up.
translation.zh: 我相信我迟早会找到那批钻石

translation.en: These things always do.
-Katie? -Detective!
I'm Julia Byron-Kim.
I'm Ms. Franklin's attorney.
translation.zh: 是富兰克林小姐的律师

translation.en: Well, Ms. Byron-Kim,
I'm gonna need you to step out so I can see both your hands.
translation.zh: 请你站出来 举起两只手

translation.en: If you just give me a minute to explain on behalf of my client.
translation.zh: 请给我一些时间代表我客户解释

translation.en: Show me your hands. Right now!
All right.
-Detective, if you would just listen-- -Look out!
Stay back.
Are you okay?
Are you okay?
You're okay, sweetie. You're okay.
Come on.
Come on. Let's get you out of here, come on.
translation.zh: 过来 我送你出去 走吧

translation.en: This is Detective Chesler.
I'm requesting a back-up and an ambulance
at 127 Queens.
translation.zh: 地点在皇后街 门牌127号

translation.en: FOUR MONTHS LATER
Katie.
-Hey. -Detective.
Sorry, I tried knocking.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我刚才敲门没人应

translation.en: Sorry, I was...
a million miles away.
A young cedar.
This is a nice spot.
-Lots of sun. -Yeah, I think so.
-It's good to see you. -And it's good to see you.
You look beautiful.
Thank you.
Yeah, we're...
We're doing well.
Well I just came by to let you know that the case is officially closed.
translation.zh: 我来是想告诉你 警方已经结案了

translation.en: Mickey Hayden and Julia Byron-Kim are the only suspects on record.
translation.zh: 该案嫌犯只有米基海登和朱莉娅拜伦金

translation.en: So your baby won't grow up to someday find out
her father had a criminal history.
Thank you, Detective.
We've been through that place a half a dozen times,
translation.zh: 我们把房子搜过好几遍了

translation.en: top to bottom.
Still can't figure it out.
He didn't tell me.
I really don't know where Adam hid the diamonds.
translation.zh: 我真的不知道亚当把钻石藏在哪里

translation.en: I'm sorry, though. I wish I did.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我真希望知道在哪里

translation.en: Take care of yourself, Katie.
translation.zh: 好好照顾自己 凯蒂

translation.en: You too.
♪ And I'll be standing next to you ♪
